text:
@NikkiHaley This is your takeaway?

Because trump joked Coronavirus was a hoax, we are now leading the world in CONFIRMED CASES.

More Americans are going to die from this virus than anywhere in the world.

Yeah. But get pissed off about money.

TRUMP FAILED AMERICANS.
#TrumpFailedAmerica
